coRdon 0.99.5
  • How to
  • Documentation
  • News

Reference

Input

readSet()

Read set of sequences.

Codon usage statistics

Methods that calculate various codon usage statistics.

ENC()

Calculate effective number of codons (ENC).

ENCprime()

Calculate effective number of codons prime (ENC').

B()

Calculate codon usage bias (B)

MCB()

Calculate maximum-likelihood codon bias (MCB)

MILC()

Calculate codon usage Measure Independent of Length and Composition (MILC)

SCUO()

Calculate eorderliness of synonymous codon usage (SCUO).

Gene expressivity predictors

Methods that calculate various predictors of gene expressivity.

CAI()

Calculate Codon Adaptation Index (CAI).

E()

Calculate gene expression measure (E).

MELP()

Calculate MILC-based Expression Level Predictor (MELP).

GCB()

Calculate gene codon bias (GCB).

Fop()

Calculate frequency of optimal codons (Fop).

Functional enrichment

Methods for the functional analysis of annotated DNA sequences.

enrichment()

Enrichment analysis for codon usage (CU) data.

enrich.matrix()

Extract chosen enrichment values to a matrix.

Visualization methods

Plotting metods.

Bplot()

Karlin B plot

intraBplot()

Intra-samples Karlin B plot

enrichMAplot()

MA plot of enriched annotations.

enrichBarplot()

Barplot of enriched and depleted annotations.

Classes

codonTable() codonCounts() getID() getlen() getKO() setKO() getCOG() setCOG()

An S4 class codonTable

show(<codonTable>)

Display the object of codonTable class.

length(<codonTable>)

Length of codonTable object.

subset(<codonTable>)

Subset codonTable object.

genCode()

An S4 class genCode

crossTab() getSeqAnnot() getVariable() contable()

An S4 class crossTab

show(<crossTab>)

Display the object of crossTab class.

length(<crossTab>)

Length of crossTab object.

reduceCrossTab()

Reduce crossTab.

Data

Datasets used in calculations or in examples.

coRdon

coRdon: codon usage analysis in R

HD59

Codon usage in healthy human gut microbiome.

HD59_KO

Codon usage based KO enrichment analysis results from the healthy human gut microbiome. For more information, see `?HD59`.

HD59_PATHWAYS

Codon usage based KEGG Pathway enrichment analysis results from a healthy human gut microbiome. For more information, see `?HD59`.

LD94

Codon usage in human gut microbiome in liver cirrhosis.

LD94_KO

Codon usage based KO enrichment analysis results from an gut microbiome of an individual with liver cirrhosis. For more information, see `?LD94`.

LD94_PATHWAYS

Codon usage based KEGG Pathway enrichment analysis results from an gut microbiome of an individual with liver cirrhosis. For more information, see `?LD94`.

RPKOs

KEGG Orthology (KO) annotations for ribosomal genes.
